    Cutting the patterns for Ziphius outfits

    04 July 2013

    We've been collaborating with our dear friends from YDreams building outfits for the ultimate aquatic gadget. Our Probotix Fireball V90 CNC has been working a lot on these outfits for Ziphius: The Aquatic Drone. Check them out!Ziphius, is an WiFi-enabled aquatic drone powered by a Raspberry Pi that can be directly controlled by any Android tablet or smartphone. The real time video allows you to control it without seeing directly where it is.

    Read the full post

    Farrusco @ Colégio Campo de Flores

    23 May 2013

    Last Week, we were invited to present  Farrusco to the children at Colégio Campo de Flores. The older students are taking their first steps into robotics -  they even have their own robot called "Caranguejo" made at their Robotics Club.
